alert.note: Alert for Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 06 at 3:14AM EST until March 07 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 1 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Northern New York, except for the Champlain Valley. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 1 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong southwesterly gusts are expected ahead and along a cold frontal boundary crossing between 1 PM and 7 PM. There is also the potential for downslope westerly wind gusts along the eastern slopes of the Adirondacks after its passage between 7 PM and midnight.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
